main.name: Dipesh Raichana
main.description: Certified Scrum Master® | Certified AWS Cloud Practitioner
main.bio: I am a seasoned Software Engineer having %s+ years of experience in software development. I have an ability to lead the teams, drive project success, and contribute significantly to company revenue growth. I am skilled with defining project workflows, ensuring code quality, and enhancing product scalability. I am passionate about learning new technologies and mentoring team.
main.contactmessage: Want to work together? Lets catch up.

resume.skillmessage: Some of the technologies I worked with recently.
resume.toolmessage: Some of the tools I use frequently.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
education.description: Mastered advanced programming concepts and technologies, gaining hands-on experience across various platforms. Successfully completed a comprehensive project utilizing Java, showcasing my practical expertise and problem-solving skills.
Learned the basics of programming languages such as Java, C#, ASP.NET & VB.NET etc. Also learned the basics of networking and information security.

work.title: Project Leader
work.description: At Aspire, I initially joined as a Senior Software Engineer and was later promoted to Project Lead. In this role, I was responsible for developing results-oriented strategies to meet project objectives and maintain high-quality standards. I successfully managed daily developer activities, ensuring timely task completion, and cultivated positive client relationships to drive new business opportunities. Additionally, I facilitated the adoption of new technologies and supported the Project Manager in ensuring project success. My expertise in working with development teams allowed me to specify project designs and resolve coding issues efficiently over my tenure

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: At Investis, I initially joined as a web producer, where I customized and integrated video players and data visualization tools for clients. As I transitioned into the role of a Software Engineer, I contributed to the development and enhancement of these tools. My work primarily involved using JavaScript, jQuery, CSS, HTML, and AngularJS. My contributions were key in delivering robust and interactive tools that met client needs and enhanced user engagement.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: During my tenure as a Software Developer at Zootar, I played a key role in developing and enhancing their product using a range of technologies including Node.js, CanJS, JavaScript, HTML, and SCSS. Over my tenure here, I had not only learned these technologies but also effectively applied them to build and optimize the product.

work.title: Intern
work.description: As an intern at BharatNaukri, I was responsible for maintaining and improving the BharatNaukri platform by identifying and fixing bugs. This hands-on experience allowed me to deepen my understanding of Java, enhancing my coding skills and problem-solving abilities. Over the course of six months, I contributed to ensuring a smoother and more reliable user experience for the platform’s users, which was crucial for its performance and user satisfaction.
